SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated

Class LightGameParty

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated.LightGameParty
All Implemented Interfaces:
Differentiable, Observed, Serializable
public class LightGameParty extends Object implements Differentiable, Observed
This class represents the game party seen by the view. It holds all the information about the player, their activity status (activer or not) the currentPlayer, the first player and the PawnColor chosen by each Player. It also holds the chat of the game.
See Also:

    • setInactivePlayer

      public void setInactivePlayer(String player)
      Set the player as inactive in the playerActiveMap. If the player is already inactive, the method does nothing If the player is not present in the map, it adds the player with the value false Notify the observers after the update
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player to set inactive

    • setActivePlayer

      public void setActivePlayer(String player)
      Set the player as active in the playerActiveMap. If the player is already active, the method does nothing If the player is not present in the map, it adds the player with the value true

    • setYourName

      public void setYourName(String yourName)
      Set the client name in the lightGameParty
      Parameters:
      yourName - the name of the player who owns the client
